snippet.title: Boutroux curves with external field: equilibrium measures without a minimization problem
snippet.description: Boutroux curves with external field: equilibrium measures without a minimization problem / Bertola, Marco The nonlinear steepest descent method for rank-two systems relies on the notion of g-function. [...] arXiv:0705.3062. \- 2007\. - 37 p. Full text
